<b>Research and analysis of biofuels as potential cost-effective energy sources.</b>

# Plant-based source of energy: energy crops

-   Three types of bio fuels:
    -   ethanol;
    -   alkanes (SAF and biomass based diesel, which includes biodiesel and renewable diesel);
    -   renewable natural gas (RNG aka biomethane);
